name: Bliss Island
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). For fun, competitive, addictive, bite-sized gaming venture into the world of Bliss Island. With over 80 unique challenges Bliss Island is the perfect pick up and play game. Give it a go and help Hoshi today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
